articles.title: Shaheen picks up big wicket of Mahmudullah for 56
articles.description: Watch as Shaheen Afridi picks up the big wicket of Mahmudullah for 56 as Pakistan claim their fifth wicket against Bangladesh during their Cricket World Cup game in Kolkata.
articles.content:

articles.author: Al Jazeera Staff
articles.title: Which teams can qualify for the ICC Cricket World Cup semifinals?
articles.description: India and South Africa are likely to qualify for the semifinals but at least five other teams are also in with a chance.
articles.content:
India are on the cusp of becoming the first team to secure a place in the semifinals of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 following their 100-run win over England.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
